dct_title_s: PHÆNOMENA circa quantita tem dierum artificialium et solarium perpetuo mutabilem, ex Hypothesi copernicana deducta, cum aliis. tam Veterum quam recentiorum Philosophorum, Systematibus mundi notabilioribus exhibita
dct_description_sm: Issued in: Atlas coelestis in quo mundus spectabilis et in eodem stellarum omnium phoenomena notabilia, circa ipsarum lumen, figuram, faciem, motum, eclipses, occultationes transitus, magnitudines distantias, aliaque secundum Nic. Copernici et ex parte Tychonis de Brahe Hipothesin ... . -- Norimbergæ, Sumptibus Heredum Homannianorum, A. 1742.

“6” (top right, outside border). Title cartouche on banner (top), with centered vignette of angels below, and text entitled “De dierum artificialium et solarium quantitate mutabili” below that. Includes eight figures, with “Fig. i.” [Figure 1] at center of page and showing 12 positions of the earth, 6 of which have California as an unlabeled island. The other figures are entitled: Fig. 2, Systema Ptolemaicum et Alphonsinum; Fig. 3, Systema Plutarchianum; Fig. 4, Sÿstema Platonicum; Fig. 5, Sÿstem a Porphyrianum; Fig. 6, Systema sec Jacobi Coccœi Hypothesin; Fig. 7, Systema Guil. Gilberti Angli; Fig. 8, Systema sec. Sebastiani Clerici Hypothesin.
à IOH. GAB. DOPPELMAIERO Acad. Cœs. Leopoldino-Carol,-Nat. Curios: Societatum que Regiarum Britanicæ et Borussicæ Sodali, et Math. Prof.
